channel.title: Server Offline?
channel.description:
Well your server status page says that my server is offline and it has been saying that for the past 2 days. My server is online and it has been online for the past 2 days!
can anyone please explain this to me ?

item.title: Server Offline?
item.dc:creator: @IamGretar IamGretar
item.description:
@IamGretar wrote:

Is there any way that you could change my server IP to "RoatPkz.no-ip.org

Read full topic

item.title: Server Offline?
item.dc:creator: @whackatre Whackatre
item.description:
@whackatre wrote:

This is my method of checking server status:

function connect($host, $port)
{
	if (@fsockopen($host, $port, $errno, $errstr, 5))
	{
		echo "$host on port $port is currently <font color = green>online</font>.<br>";
	}
	else
	{
		echo "$host on port $port is currently <font color = red>offline</font>.<br>";
	}
}

Read full topic

item.title: Server Offline?
item.dc:creator: @IamGretar IamGretar
item.description:
@IamGretar wrote:

Hmm i’m pretty sure I have not blocked your IP, and there is probably not a router problem.
How does the system work ?

Read full topic

item.title: Server Offline?
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

If my server says your server is offline, that means I can’t connect to it from my server. Perhaps you IP banned me, or perhaps there is a router down in between us.

Read full topic
